productEmsList.title: RGB illumination
productEmsList.tooltip: Enhance your audio entertainment experience with multi-colour RGB lighting.

PRODUCT_PAGE_SUPPLEMENTARY_DISCLAIMERS.PRODUCT_PAGE_AWESOME_DISCLAIMER: Engineering enhancements are ongoing and may not be reflected in the pictures, videos and specifications.

inTheBoxTab.content:
4" 120-watt Classic Marine Speaker

 
  • One pair of XS-F40CWB speakers
  • 12 Phillips stainless steel mounting screws (3.5 mm x 25.4 mm / 6 gauge x 1”)
  • Speaker grilles (1 pair classic white/ 1 pair classic black)
  • Documentation

6.5" 200-watt Classic Marine Speaker

  • One pair of XS-F65CWB speakers
  • 12 Phillips stainless steel mounting screws (4.2 mm x 25.4 mm / 8 gauge x 1”)
  • Speaker grilles (1 pair classic white/ 1 pair classic black)
  • Documentation

6.5" 200-watt Sports Marine Speaker

  • One pair of XS-F65SPGW speakers
  • 12 Phillips stainless steel mounting screws (4.2 mm x 25.4 mm / 8 gauge x 1”)
  • Speaker grilles (1 sports gray/1 sports white)
  • Documentation

6.5" 200-watt Sports Marine Speaker with RGB LED Lighting

  • One pair of XS-FL65SPGW speakers
  • 12 Phillips stainless steel mounting screws (4.2 mm x 25.4 mm / 8 gauge x 1”)
  • Speaker grilles (1 sports gray/1 sports white)
  • Documentation

7.7" 240-watt Classic Marine Speaker

  • One pair of XS-F77CWB speakers
  • 12 Phillips stainless steel mounting screws (4.2 mm x 25.4 mm / 8 gauge x 1”)
  • Speaker grilles (1 pair classic white/ 1 pair classic black)
  • Documentation

7.7" 240-watt Sports Marine Speaker

  • One pair of XS-F77SPGW speakers
  • 12 Phillips stainless steel mounting screws (4.2 mm x 25.4 mm / 8 gauge x 1”)
  • Speaker grilles (1 sports gray/1 sports white)
  • Documentation

  • One pair of XS-FL77SPGW speakers

  • Speaker grilles (1 sports gray/1 sports white)
  • Documentation

specsTab.content:
General
Sizes4"/6.5"/7.7"
ColorClassic White/Black or Sports Gray/White
Physical dimensions (Diameter)4" (Classic): 135 mm (5.31")
6.5" (Classic/Sports): 81 mm (6.97")
7.7" (Classic/Sports): 196 mm (7.72")
Physical dimensions (Depth)4" (Classic): 68 mm (2.68")
6.5" (Classic): 81 mm (3.19")
7.7" (Sports): 83 mm (3.27")
7.7" (Classic): 94 mm (3.7")
7.7" (Sports): 97 mm (3.82")
Weight4" (Classic): 0.8 kg (1.76 lbs)
6.5" (Classic): 1.2 kg (2.65 lbs)
6.5" (Sports): 1.2 kg (2.65 lbs)
6.5" (Sports) with RGB: 1.2 kg (2.65 lbs)

7.7" (Sports): 1.95 kg (4.3 lbs)
7.7" (Sports) with RGB: 1.9 kg (4.19 lbs)
Water and dust ratingIP65
Speaker typeCoaxial
Continuous power handling (RMS)4": 30 W
6.5": 50 W
7.7": 60 W
Sensitivity (SPL @ 1 W/1 m)4": 87 dB
6.5": 91 dB
7.7": 92 dB
Frequency response (+/- 3 dB)4": 100 Hz-18 kHz
6.5": 80 Hz-18 kHz
7.7": 70 Hz-18 khz
Nominal impedance4 Ω
LED lightingYes - RGB (selected Sport models only)
LED supply voltage10.8-16 VDC (selected Sport models only)
LED Load Current @ 14.4 VDC (max)150 mA (selected Sport models only)
Operating temperature range0° to 50° C (32° to 122° F)
Cone material4": Polypropylene cone with rubber surround
6.5"/7.7": Polypropylene Cone with Cloth Surround
Tweeter typeAluminum Dome
Warranty3 years

Electrical features
Compass safe distance4": 255 cm (100.5")
6.5": 310 cm (122")
7.7": 400 cm (157.5")

Connections
Speaker connectionsSpade Connectors
LED connectionBullet Connectors (selected Sport models only)

Mounting Dimensions
Mounting diameter clearance4": 99 mm (3.9")
6.5": 135 mm (5.31")
7.7": 162 mm (6.38")
Mounting depth clearance4": 54 mm (2.13")
6.5": 67 mm (2.64")
7.7": 77 mm (3.03")

6.5": 19 mm (0.75")
7.7": 23 mm (0.91")
